summary: It\'s a little spell mod i created for fun
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE 1.0 (BETA)
It\\\'s my first real spell mod so don\\\'t be angry if it isn\\\'t what you expected. There are 2 spells right now called The Spell Of Doom And The Spell Of Light. The spells can be found in riften at the first bridge towards the marketplace

Spell Of Doom: You use it like flames but when it touches the ground it will create a fire barricade

Spell Of Light: You cast it on yourself and it will light you up and will heal you

The spells can be found in riften at the first bridge towards the marketplace
author: augustfriis
